_description: Fallback display name mappings for models, personas, and themes when config hasn't loaded yet

models._comment: AI model ID to human-readable name mappings
models._purpose: Provides display names during initial render before dropdownData loads
models._usage: Add new model mappings here as they become available

personas._comment: Persona ID to display name mappings
personas._purpose: Provides display names during initial render before dropdownData loads
personas._usage: Add new persona mappings here as they are defined

themes._comment: Theme ID to display name mappings
themes._purpose: Provides display names during initial render before dropdownData loads
themes._usage: Add new theme mappings here as themes are created
